welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hanahan, a charming city known for its southern hospitality and rich history. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that Hanahan has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleston, AFB Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Charleston, AFB Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleston Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on a private jet, the private jet terminal at Charleston Executive Airport provides exclusive services and accommodations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
